It has indeed warmed slightly ( by at most 1.9 degrees Fahrenheit ) over the past 100 years .
Saying so ignores an unexplained cooling from about 1940 into the 1970s .
Predictions of floods here and heat waves there and falling sky somewhere else are produced by already failed computer models .
None can reproduce changes in temperature observed in the past .
Unsurprised critics note that the concentrations of water vapor in the troposphere that are supposed to amplify warming simply are n't there .

The assessment rambles about heat and rainfall and other unpleasantness , but pays no attention to the fact that there is no trend in the incidence of tornadoes , or the fact that hurricanes making landfall are at a record low , or the fact that even more emission cuts than Obama wants would lower the temperature in 2100 by one - seventh of a degree .
